profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: A different image [sound recording] : recitations : the legacy of Broadside Press, an anthology / Albert M. Ward, Gloria House.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Detroit, Mich.] : University of Detroit Mercy Press and Broadside Press, c2004.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Accompanies A different image : the legacy of Broadside Press : an anthology / [edited by] Gloria House, Rosemary Weatherston, and Albert M. Ward.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Poems of Etheridge Knight, Haki Madhubuti, and Dudley Randall recited by Albert M. Ward; poems of Gwendolyn Brooks, Audre Lord, and Sonia Sanchez recited by Gloria House.
